businesses.company_name: Foshan Pengxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
businesses.description_en: Foshan Pengxin Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. is a dedicated Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS) provider operating from a modern facility in the CIFI Smart Manufacturing Centre, Foshan. The company integrates advanced production technology with a comprehensive one-stop processing model to deliver high-precision electronic assemblies. Its core capabilities are built around automated surface-mount technology (SMT) lines, lead-free soldering processes, and rigorous automated optical inspection (AOI), ensuring consistent product quality. Foshan Pengxin's electronic products and manufacturing services support diverse, technology-driven markets including industrial automation, medical devices, security and access control systems, biometrics (face recognition), public broadcasting, and entertainment gaming equipment.

offerings.name: Industrial PC Board

businesses.description_en: Future Labs Europe, part of the Futurelabs Enterprise group, recently acquired Britec Srl, consolidating over 15 years of specialized experience in the display, cable, and integrated solutions sector. This strategic move has significantly expanded the product portfolio, making it broader and more competitive, while strengthening technical and logistical support for customers, distributors, and partners on a national and European scale. The company positions itself as a reliable partner for diversified markets, offering customized solutions that combine flexibility and high-quality standards. The international team follows projects from the initial phases, transforming ideas into concrete, valuable products with a focus on innovation and continuous support.

Shenzhen Outdoor Special Display Equipment Co., Ltd. is a specialized provider focused on the design, manufacturing, and integration of outdoor special display equipment. Based in Guangming New District, Shenzhen, the company operates a 3,000-square-meter modern factory with over 50 employees. It is equipped with advanced machinery including large laser cutters, high-precision CNC punching machines, CNC bending machines, digital hydraulic shears, CNC milling machines, and spray testing facilities, enabling complete in-house production from sheet metal processing to final assembly. The company's core offerings encompass commercial display equipment, outdoor high-brightness display sheet metal, customized advertising kiosks, and splicing monitor kits. It provides a comprehensive one-stop service covering design and R&D, OEM manufacturing, painting, and full integration of outdoor high-brightness display systems. With dedicated teams for sheet metal engineering, display integration, thermal management, waterproofing, and safety design, the company serves as a reliable long-term partner in the digital signage industry.
